remarks: Set of morphisms ("arrows") of the category of extensible structures (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 7-Mar-2020.)
statement:
estrcbas.c $e |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
estrcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
estrchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
estrchomfval $p |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. U , y e. U |-> ( ( Base ` y ) ^m ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
